President Trump calls for death penalty for illegal immigrants who kill Americans
Photo Alamy President Donald Trump hammered the border crisis during his speech in Coachella, California, on Saturday. He stood before a massive crowd and described how the mass influx of illegal immigrants allowed by the Biden/Harris administration has delivered a “nightmare invasion.” The 45th president noted how his opponent, Kamala Harris, supports allowing “illegal aliens”
